name: solemnization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act or process of solemnizing a marriage (= performing the official ceremony): The Act of Parliament regulates the solemnization of marriages in England. Solemnization by the church was not required by the state as the condition of a legitimate marriage. See
solemnize
More examplesFewer examplesCan Parliament dictate how the celebration or the solemnization of marriage will be done?The principal aim of the ritual is the solemnization of human relationships.He proposes an immediate solemnization of their marriage vows.
